name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

WHEN THE LIGHTS GO OFF...THE BATTLE IS ON!



Embark on an incredible adventure through The Smithsonian as Larry Daley, the only night guard who can control the chaos when the exhibits magically awake. Larry must free his captured friends, battle history's greatest villains, recover a magic tablet and prevent an ancient army from taking over the world...all before the sun comes up!

Features

• Change Larry's abilities with magic: make him climb, super jump, fly, shrink, charge and more• Features the likeness of Ben Stiller for an authentic movie experience• Use Larry's flashlight and keychain to navigate 27 side-scrolling levels
